title: Correction to: Low-Temperature X-ray Microanalysis Sheds New Light on Mineral Nutrition Aspects of Insect Leaf Galling
content: This is a correction to: Denise R Fernando, Peter T Green, Alan T Marshall, Low-Temperature X-ray Microanalysis Sheds New Light on Mineral Nutrition Aspects of Insect Leaf Galling, Microscopy and Microanalysis, 2024;, ozae008, https://doi.org/10.1093/micmic/ozae008
